page.title: 01DUNDEE - CARSE OF GOWRIE
page.content: This area has many interesting features-farmland,villages,variety of housing,schools,shops,factories,health centre,libraries,sports centres. These facilities provide-food,shelter,care, education,employment and recreation for the people who live here. At present,(1985), a Technology Park is being developed. This will bring industry and employment to the area. Nearby, a new road system is being built and the main Dundee-Perth road will now by-pass Invergowrie village. Although employment here is good now, unemployment is widespread,making more time available for leisure. Here there is a choice of football,bowling,indoor games at the new Lynch Centre, a wide variety of clubs and classes at the Community Centre and libraries for those who enjoy reading.
